column2: "Aber a Joas hyɛɛ ase dɛ oridzi hen no nna oedzi mfe esuon; na odzii hen mfe eduanan wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Zibia
column3: ofi Beer-seba."

column2: "Na Joas yɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do wɔ ɔsɔfo Jehoiada ne nda nyinara mu."
"Na Jehoiada waar yernom beenu maa no; na ɔwowoo mbabanyin na mbabaa."
"Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: iyi ekyir no
column4: Joas nyaa adwen dɛ obesiesie EWURADZE ne fi no fofor."

column2: "Na ɔpoon asɔfo na Levifo no hyiae
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column4: Hom mfir edzi nkɔ Juda nkurow do
column5: na hom nkɔboaboa sika ano wɔ Israel nyinara hɔ dɛ hom dze rebɛyɛ hom Nyankopɔn fi no yie afrenhyia afrenhyia
column6: na hom nhwɛ ma ɔnyɛ ntsɛm. Naaso Levifo no amma annyɛ ntsɛm."

column2: "Na ɔhen no frɛɛ otsitsir Jehoiada
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na emmbisa Levifo no dɛ wɔngyegye Juda na Jerusalɛm tow a EWURADZE n'akowaa Moses
column5: na Israel mboanofo no hyɛe maa dasebuw no mmba?"

column2: "Na Atalia
column3: ɔbaa bɔn no
column4: ne mba ebubu Nyankopɔn fi no mu; na EWURADZE fie ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn nyinara so wɔahwer no ama Baalim."

column2: "Nna ɔhen no hyɛe ma wɔpaam adaka bi
column3: na wɔdze sii EWURADZE fi abotsen no ano guado."

column2: "Na wɔbɔɔ dawur faa Juda na Jerusalɛm
column3: dɛ wɔmfa Nyankopɔn n'akowaa Moses tow a ɔdze too Israel do wɔ sar no do no mbrɛ EWURADZE."

column2: "Na mbapɔmba no nyinara na ɔman no nyinara enyi gyee
column3: na wɔdze bae boguu adaka no mu araa kodur dɛ wowiei."

column2: "Na aber biara a Levifo no bohu dɛ sika no adɔɔ so wɔ adaka no mu no nna wɔdze abrɛ ɔhen ne kyerɛwfo na nyia ɔsɔfopanyin no hyɛɛ no dɛ ɔnhwɛ do no
column3: na wohue no wɔ adaka no mu
column4: na wɔma adaka no do soa kesi ne sibew bio. Dɛm na wɔyɛɛ no daa nyina

column2: "Na ɔhen no na Jehoiada dze maa hɔn a wɔyɛ EWURADZE fie som edwuma no; na wɔdze bobɔɔ abopaafo na nduadwimfo paa dɛ wonsiesie EWURADZE ne fi no fofor
column3: na hɔn a wɔyɛ dadze na boran dwuma no so dɛ wommiamia EWURADZE ne fi no mu."

column2: "Nna edwumayɛfo no yɛɛ edwumadzen
column3: na wowiee nsiesie edwuma no nyinara yɛ
column4: na wɔdze Nyankopɔn ne fi no gyinaa ne gyinabew

column2: "Na aber a wowiei no
column3: nna wɔdze sika no nkaa baa ɔhen no na Jehoiada enyim
column4: ɔno na wɔdze yeyɛɛ ndzɛmbandzɛmba maa EWURADZE ne fi no
column8: na sika na dwetɛ ndzɛmba no. Na wɔbɔɔ ɔhyew afɔr wɔ EWURADZE fi no mu daa wɔ Jehoiada ne nda nyinara mu."

column2: "Na Jehoiada yɛɛ akɔdaa a nna oedzi nda pii
column3: na owui; aber a owui no na oedzi mfe ɔha eduasa."

column2: "Na wokesiee no David kurow mu wɔ ahemfo no mu
column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛɛ papa wɔ Israel mu
column4: na Nyankopɔn na ne fi no ho afamu."

column2: "Afei Jehoiada no wu ekyir no Juda mbapɔmba no bae
column3: na wɔbɛyɛɛ ɔhen no enyidzi. Nna ɔhen no tsiee hɔn."

column2: "Na wɔpoow EWURADZE
column3: hɔn egyanom Nyankopɔn no
column5: na wɔkɔsoom Aserim na abosom no: na ebufuw baa Juda na Jerusalɛm do wɔ hɔn asodzi yi ntsi."

column2: "Naaso ɔsomaa nkɔnhyɛfo ma wɔkɔr hɔn nkyɛn
column3: dɛ wɔnkɛsan hɔn mbra EWURADZE nkyɛn bio; naaso woentsie hɔn: na wɔammpɛ dɛ wɔyɛ aso."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn no sunsum baa ɔsɔfo Jehoiada ne ba Zekaria do; na okegyinaa ɔman no do
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column5: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom to EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm
column6: ma hom nntum nnyɛ prɔmprɔm yi? Osiandɛ hom apow EWURADZE ntsi

column2: "Na wɔpaam ne tsir do
column3: na wokesiiw no abo dɛ mbrɛ ɔhen no ne mbrasɛm tse wɔ EWURADZE fie abangua no do."

column2: "Dɛm na ɔhen Joas annkaa adɔyɛ a Zekaria n'egya Jehoiada dze yɛɛ no no
column3: na okum ne ba no. Na aber a oruwu no
column5: EWURADZE nhwɛ na ɔntɔ do wer."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ afe no n'ewiei no
column3: nna Siriafo dɔm baa Joas do: na wɔbɔɔ Juda na Jerusalɛm
column4: na wɔbɛsɛɛ ɔman no hɔn asafohemfo nyinara
column5: na wɔdze hɔn asadze no nyinara kɛmaa Damaskɔs hen no."

column2: "Na Siriafo dɔm no dze nyimpa kuw kakraabi bae
column3: na EWURADZE dze dɔmtutuw kɛsenara hyɛɛ hɔn nsa
column5: hɔn egyanom Nyankopɔn no. Dɛm na wobuu Joas atsɛn."

column2: "Na aber a wofii ne nkyɛn kɔree no
column3: nna woegya no epirakur pii
column4: na nankasa no nkowaa paam ne tsir do wɔ ɔsɔfo Jehoiada ne mba hɔn bɔgyaa no ntsi
column5: na wokokum no wɔ ne mpa do
column6: na owui: na wosiee no wɔ David kurow mu
column7: na woennsie no wɔ ahemfo hɔn asamandan no mu."

column2: "Na woyinom nye hɔn a wɔpaam ne tsir do no
column3: Ammonnyi Simeat ne ba Zabad
column4: na Moabnyi Simrit ne ba Jehozabad."

column2: "Afei dza ɔfa ne mba ho
column3: na nkɔnhyɛsɛm dodow a wɔkaa tsiaa no
column4: na Nyankopɔn ne fi ne nsiesie ho no
column6: wɔakyerɛw no wɔ ahemfo nwoma ne nkyerɛkyerɛase no mu. Na ne babanyin Amazia dzii hen wɔ n'ananmu."
